description:
snapshot_instance stacktrace when nova.image.glance raises ImageNotFound, but this is an expected error and no reason to stacktrace for it.

http://logs.openstack.org/76/44876/5/check/gate-tempest-devstack-vm-full/f729bb6/logs/screen-n-cpu.txt.gz#_2013-09-04_15_49_01_323
title: snapshot_instance stacktrace when ImageNotFound

comments.content:
We stacktrace when python-glanceclient returns ImageNotFound.  It looks like this is because python-glanceclient changed its Exceptions at one point and nova didn't.



http://logs.openstack.org/76/44876/5/check/gate-tempest-devstack-vm-full/f729bb6/logs/screen-n-cpu.txt.gz#_2013-09-04_15_49_01_323
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/45497
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/45497
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/0b7d635b9f960279c988c6e525b2c24083ba36b2
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 0b7d635b9f960279c988c6e525b2c24083ba36b2
Author: Joe Gordon <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Sep 6 14:28:45 2013 -0700

    Don't stacktrace on ImageNotFound in image_snapshot
    
    snapshot_instance stacktrace when nova.image.glance raises
    ImageNotFound, but this is an expected error and no reason to stacktrace
    for it.
    
    Fix bug 1221925
    
    Change-Id: I41af76f569d0b93b0d25750c529918328b9ea946
